channel.title: Opening clients
channel.description:
Hi all, i've got a small problem
whenever i try to open a 508 Client, it normally comes up with this:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .
If anyone knows what to do, or has a code which may work for me, post here! :)
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2009, 09:49:51 am[/size][hr]Also, sometimes the client closes when i click somewhere in the window :/ The stuff above is more important though :)

Thanks alot for the help
